About

My name is Alex Gibson and I'm a freelance Front End Developer living in Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom. I write the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for websites and applications, so that they look and work great on mobiles, tablets and desktop web browsers.

In my spare time I help out as a co-maintainer on Mobile Boilerplate, and also write the occasional guest post for HTML5 Doctor.

You can hire me for

  • Front end website development.
  • Web application development.
  • Mobile web development.
  • JavaScript plugins.
  • Project consultancy.

Technologies & I use

  • HTML5, CSS(3), JavaScript.
  • jQuery, Zepto.
  • Backbone, Underscore.
  • Sass/Compass.
  • Jasmine.
  • PHP, MySQL.

Contact me

If you would like to discuss working together, feel free to send me an email. You can find me online in the following places:

  • GitHub
  • Twitter
  • Google+
